mapper.insert: insert into company_tb (company_Id, company_password, company_email, created_at) values(#{companyId}, #{companyPassword}, #{companyEmail}, now())
mapper.update: update company_tb set username= #{username},password= #{password}, email= #{email} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from company_tb where company_id = #{companyid} and company_password = #{companypassword}
